patthana13.12:1.1_0: Parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Parittaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.12:1.1_1: paṭicca namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappamāṇo
patthana13.12:1.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto ca naappamāṇo ca
patthana13.12:1.1_3: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo
patthana13.12:2.1_0: Mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.12:2.1_1: paṭicca naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappamāṇo
patthana13.12:2.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto ca naappamāṇo
patthana13.12:2.1_3: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo
patthana13.12:3.1_0: Appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.12:3.1_1: paṭicca naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato
patthana13.12:3.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo
patthana13.12:3.1_3: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto ca namahaggato
patthana13.12:4.1_0: Parittañca appamāṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:4.1_1: Parittañca appamāṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Parittañca
patthana13.12:4.1_2: appamāṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:5.1_0: Parittañca mahaggatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Parittañca
patthana13.12:5.1_1: mahaggatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Parittañca
patthana13.12:5.1_2: mahaggatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Parittañca
patthana13.12:5.1_3: mahaggatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:5.1_4: Parittañca mahaggatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana13.12:6.1: Hetuyā tevīsa, ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā ekūnavīsa …pe… aññamaññe soḷasa …pe… purejāte āsevane nava …pe… avigate tevīsa. (Sabbattha vitthāretabbaṁ.)
